task.summary: Default task
Spelling mistake corrected (Zentrieren)
Cosmetic changes
Changed version number
Date of version changed

Plot pressure shows correct if it comes from a third sensor
public/js/global.js: If besides DHT22 there is an BME280 as third sensor, use only the pressure value from BME280
app.js delete needless require statement
package.json adapt version nunmber and date
Refresh graphics 15sec after every 5 min

Sort korrelation-sensor-array Map height is now 785px
public/css/style.css map height now 785px
app.js Port for Mongo is 2017, if host == rexfue.de, otherwise it is 2018, so we have to use ssh tunnel to get to mongo on rexfue.de
public/js/global.js sort sensor array from korrelation, that SDS011 is first sensor

buttons are better aligned with graphics border
public/css/style.css better margins for buttons
views/mapit.pug correct indent of buttons
Version number now 2.0.3
chande portnumber for MongoDB
y-axis of pressure from 980 to 1030 hPa
removed unneccesary require statements

PYTHON/korrelation/dat2mongo_2.py - all comments in english - actions from dat2mongo.py and old dat2moingo_2.py merged
PYTHON/korrelation/korr_apr17.py - all comments in english - dont read from 'luftdate.info', read from disk - crate TTL-index if new sensor are detected
PYTHON/korrelation/dopython.sh, tstalt.pa, ttlindex.py - new in git
routes/fsdate.js - some comments an unused functions deleted

PYTHON/korrelation/dat2mongo_2.py - all comments in english - actions from dat2mongo.py and old dat2moingo_2.py merged
PYTHON/korrelation/korr_apr17.py - all comments in english - dont read from 'luftdate.info', read from disk - crate TTL-index if new sensor are detected
PYTHON/korrelation/dopython.sh, tstalt.pa, ttlindex.py - new in git
routes/fsdate.js - some comments an unused functions deleted

public/css/style.css - tooltip opacity set to 1
public/js/global.js - get date of odest entry at start - start date can be changed - tooltip is no longer transparent
public/js/map.js - center map on sensor
routes/data.js - obsolete 'require' deleted
routes/fsdata.js - get oldest date - use start date - error in average calculation deleted
views/index.pug - button for 'start-day'
package.json - new versionnumber - adopted dependencies
public/js/global.js - new colors for P10/P25-lines
routes/fsdata.js - moving average at SDS011 cap only 1 value on each end

public/js/global.js - average time can be set frm settings menu, will be stored in local storage - start day can be changed (NOT OK TIL NOW) - use simplified formula to calulate pressure on sealevel - changed background-color of chart
routes/fsdata.js - average time as parameter to ajax call - calculating average corrected
routes/index.js - start day as parameter vor html file
views/index.pug - use startday as parameter
views/layout.pug - datepicker for german added

public/js/global.js - new colors for background
public/setting.htm - some new text
routes/fsdata.js - misspellings corrected
app.js - mongohost now 'castor'

public/css/style.css - backgroundcolor for info table with tranparancy
public/js/global.js - all yaxis on left side - new flag 'live' for live plot or sected day plot - position of infotable at left side - yaxis labels same color as lines - new message, if there are no datas for today
routes/fsdata.js - use new 'live' flag
app.js - mostly ECMA6-style
allgemeine Anpassungen an die neue DB-Aufteilung
Sealevel wird in fsdata gerechnent Datenreduzierung wird nicht mehr gemacht
Da hammer jetzt viel angepasst und geändert - noch nicht fertig !!
Many changes. Ist works now without MAP
Wochendartstellung mit ecten Werten außer 24hMitte Mittelberechnung neu Starttag richtig rum
Map geht wieder sonst euin Haufen Änderungen
